title: Formative Assessment-Driven Design for Deepening Mathematical Concept Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of high school-level basic mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Applying mathematical concepts in real-life problem-solving scenarios through VR simulations

learning_goals: Learners can solve math problems presented in a VR simulation environment with over 85% accuracy.
Learners achieve over 90% improvement rates when revising answers using three-step explanatory feedback for formative quiz errors.
Learners reduce error rates for the same concept by over 50% in two consecutive formative assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
